name: ShowAndTell
headline: Agents for dental operations
description: ShowAndTell creates AI agents for dental patient operations. Our agents educate patients, boost case acceptance, and build lasting trust. We enable dental staff to focus on patient care rather than patient operations.

founders.name: Daniel Bessonov, Founder
founders.description: Danny graduated from Penn M&T with a master’s degree in computer science. Danny most recently lead product intelligence at Wispr.ai, and was previously at Ramp, Anduril, and Lumos. Daniel has architected core payment features for Ramp’s $xmm Bill Pay product, built encryption features for Anduril UAVs, & was a Top 25 App Store developer at 14 years old.

generated_description:
### ShowAndTell: Revolutionizing Dental Operations

**Mission:** ShowAndTell is on a mission to transform dental operations by developing AI agents specifically designed for patient interactions. By focusing on educating patients, enhancing case acceptance, and fostering trust, ShowAndTell empowers dental offices to prioritize the quality of patient care rather than getting bogged down in administrative tasks.

**Founding and Background:** Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator’s Batch F24, ShowAndTell is rooted in San Francisco’s vibrant tech ecosystem. The company is small but mighty, with just two employees driving innovation in the dental sector.

**What They Do:** The crux of ShowAndTell’s service is to create generative AI agents that streamline patient operations at dental practices. These agents not only handle the operational side but also engage with patients to elevate their overall experience. The goal is straightforward: allow dental staff to focus on what they do best — offering exceptional, hands-on care.

**Key Personnel:** Under the guidance of Group Partner Pete Koomen, the team is setting a new standard for patient operations in the dental field.

**Tagline:** "Next-generation patient operations that let you focus on exceptional, in-person care."

**Location:** Based in the San Francisco Bay Area, ShowAndTell is positioned to tap into a wealth of resources in health tech and AI.

**Industry Focus:** The company operates at the intersection of generative AI and health tech, specifically targeting the dental industry. This puts it among the innovative players pushing for efficiency and better patient interactions in healthcare.

**Online Presence:** For more information about their journey and services, you can visit their [website](https://www.tryshowandtell.com). 

ShowAndTell promises to be more than just a tool; they aim to transform the way dental practices engage with their patients, ensuring that technology supports rather than distracts from personal care.
